description: Detects uncommon target processes for remote thread creation
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
name: Remote Thread Creation In Uncommon Target Image
query: (winlog.event_data.TargetImage:(*\\calc.exe OR *\\calculator.exe OR *\\explorer.exe OR *\\mspaint.exe OR *\\notepad.exe OR *\\ping.exe OR *\\sethc.exe OR *\\spoolsv.exe OR *\\wordpad.exe OR *\\write.exe) AND (NOT (((process.executable.text:"C:\Windows\System32\csrss.exe" AND winlog.event_data.TargetImage:"C:\Windows\System32\spoolsv.exe")) OR (StartFunction:"EtwpNotificationThread") OR (process.executable.text:"*unknown\ process*") OR ((process.executable.text:"C:\Program Files\VMware\VMware Tools\vmtoolsd.exe" AND StartFunction:"GetCommandLineW" AND winlog.event_data.TargetImage:("C:\Windows\explorer.exe" OR "C:\Windows\System32\notepad.exe" OR "C:\Windows\System32\spoolsv.exe"))) OR ((process.executable.text:"C:\Windows\System32\rundll32.exe" AND winlog.event_data.TargetImage:"C:\Windows\explorer.exe" AND StartFunction:("LoadLibraryW" OR "FreeLibrary"))) OR ((process.executable.text:"C:\Program Files\WinZip\FAHWindow64.exe" AND winlog.event_data.TargetImage:"C:\Windows\explorer.exe")))))
